name: MusicBot
description: Open-Source bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your Bot username without @, this is fcking necessary, if it doesn't matches bot username u won't be able to use inline

OWNER_ID.description: The bot owner id, it will send a message to your pm everytime someone adds bot

BOT_ID.description: needed to notify owner when bot is added in some group

START_PIC.description: The pic to show in the start message, if not set default ohto-kun pic will be used

PLAY_PIC.description: The pic to be used while playing tg file, if not set default ohto-kun pic will be used

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user IDs counted as admin everywhere (separated by space).

PROXY.description: A proxy, if you don't know what this means leave it

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes).
